name: Super Slimedroidvania
description:
You are Slimy, a rainbow colored slime who is an outcome of experiments from a crazy doctor called Dr. Zerberus to steal all the colors of the world. But you managed to escape and now your goal is to save all the colors of the world from the crazy Doctor Zerberus.

Super Slimedroidvania will be a small but fun and challenging metroidvania like platformer. You can play  aprototype of the first region now. It features some enemies, features like absorbing enemies and crushing rocks with them and lasers. Can you escpae the caves of the laboratory?

Let me now what you think, I am open for feedback, suggestions and ideas :)

Controls:

You can play with keyboard or gamepad.

Keyboard:

Arrow keys to move around, Shift to dash, Space to jump and "x" to get smaller again.

Gamepad:

Left stick to move around, RB to dash, A to jump, and B to get smaller again.
